author: Staff Reporter
text:
Anti-dengue operations intensified in Thoothukudi

The corporation health team taking up fogging operations at Thoothukudi Medical College Hospital on Friday.— Photo: N. Rajesh

Seven special teams from the health unit districts of Villupuram, Kallakurichi, Cheiyyar and Pudukottai have arrived here to check anti-dengue operations carried out by the Corporation.

The special teams comprised Block Health Supervisors, Health Inspectors and Malarial Mazdoors, said City Health Officer Pradeep V. Krishnakumar here on Friday.

High-risk areas

The teams would inspect high-risk areas such as slum dwellings for cleanliness in houses, public hygiene.

Currently, anti-dengue operations have been intensified in the town.

Fogging

Fogging operations were carried out on the premises of the Thoothukudi Government Medical College Hospital.
title: Dengue: special teams in town
